text: The Boys in Company C is a 1978 American Hong Kong Vietnam War drama movie directed by Sidney J. Furie and starring Stan Shaw, Andrew Stevens, Craig Wasson, Michael Lembeck, Scott Hylands and R. Lee Eremy. It was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1978 war movies Category:American war movies Category:1970s American drama movies Category:Hong Kong drama movies Category:Movies directed by Sidney J. title: The Boys in Company C
